name: One Ticket to the Lonely Soul Scarecrow Show
name_original: One Ticket to the Lonely Soul Scarecrow Show
description:
One Ticket for the Lonely Soul Scarecrow Show was originally intended to be a short, simple game where you walk around a corn maze and talk to the scarecrows that inhabit it.

For the most part, that is still true, but a couple months before release, I stopped working on the game. Instead, I've decided to use the shell of this game as a way to talk about and reflect on my first year as a game maker, as well as the development process for this game. I've taken to calling it a time capsule or a playable blog post, so please factor that into your expectations!
